CustomField.description: Formula field for use in data table displays. Should be removed when the functionality of data tables improves
CustomField.formula:
IF( NOT(ISBLANK( SourceLegacy__c )),
PrimaryClientName__c + IF(ISBLANK( JointOwner__c),""," & " + JointOwnerName__c) + "'s " + SourceLegacy__r.Public_Provider_Name__r.Name + " " + SourceLegacy__r.RecordType.Name + " (" + SourceLegacy__r.FinServ__FinancialAccountNumber__c + ")", PreRequisiteRecommendationSource__r.PrimaryClientName__c + IF(ISBLANK( PreRequisiteRecommendationSource__r.JointOwner__c),""," & " + PreRequisiteRecommendationSource__r.JointOwnerName__c) + "'s " + ProductName__c )
CustomField.label: Source name
